snippet: You can buy one large cabbage and use it several times for different recipes, experiencing the deceptively versatile vegetable many ways.
abstract: Melissa Clark A Good Appetite column offers three recipes for cabbage, including pasta with caramelized cabbage, anchovies and bread crumbs.
lead_paragraph: You can buy one large cabbage and use it several times for different recipes, experiencing the deceptively versatile vegetable many ways.

headline.seo: Cabbage Flexes Its Brawn Three Ways
headline.main: Cabbage Flexes Its Muscles Three Ways
headline.print_headline: Cabbage Flexes Its Muscles Three Ways
